title: Here’s When To Use Write-Ahead Log and Logical Replication in Database Systems
author: Raja Chattopadhyay
description: Combining Write Ahead Log (WAL) with replication in a hybrid consistency model is recommended for resilient systems requiring fault tolerance.
cntitle: 数据库系统中何时使用预写式日志和逻辑复制
cndescription: 建议将预写日志 (WAL) 与复制结合在混合一致性模型中，以实现需要容错能力的弹性系统。
